column5: http://myoutdoortv.com/new/fishing.html  Linders fishing edge!  83 episodes wow!  fish-in-canada, going fishing, winklemen  its like the jackpot!  fishing shows when you want them how cool!  Enjoy!  Cheers!
Looks good, thanks for the link. Dave Mercer isn't in the lineup so it's not quite the Holy Grail yet.
cool thanks  I will never get any work done at work I had better request another worker to pick up the slack
Thanks for the link...great resource of shows there!
Great post, thanks for the link!
Terrific find, Lunkerbasshunter.  Thanks for that.  Cogeco subscribers in Hamilton don't get WFN so this will keep me entertain for quite a while!!!  Thank you.

I remember thinking a few years ago how great it would be if fishing shows were viewable online for all to see.  It was really cool when Bob Izumi started putting his episodes online at www.realfishing.com a year or so ago.  More are added every so often and it makes it so easy to re-watch favorite episodes.  The site linked above  appears to be a huge resource of different shows, many of which I've never heard of or seen.  I'll check it out in the near future for sure.
no problem guys.  a customer of mine put me on to this site and i must say....very cool stuff!
you hit the home run here thanks
this is a great web site. Thanks!
Here I am watching Outdoor Alabama... just so I can figure out what the hell GCD is saying when conversing! might take me awhile.....   G
Thanks for the link,i think its pretty cool,  lots of shows & info there for sure !!!!....cheers
Dave's not their man.. but lots of others to waste the day in the office with Pete! LOL
Thanks for posting that link. Now I'll have something to do while I'm at work.
Thats AWESOME!  Thanks lunkerbasshunter.  Haven't been able to watch my 2 favourite fishing shows in years, Lindners and Winkelman.
